entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 60 late in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
